189122828877515431.NAME: I'm already crafting you a piece of custom armor. Just be patient. You can't rush quality.

4354257353146619625.NAME: You bring me the snow bear pelts and gold, and I'll make a piece of custom snow bear armor.  I'll have it ready in twenty-four hours.  You've got my list of prices and pelt requirements.  Which piece of armor were you interested in?
4354257353146619625.BNAM: Choice "Snow Bear Cuirass" 1 "Snow Bear Right Pauldron" 2 "Snow Bear Left Pauldron" 3 "Snow Bear Right Gauntlet" 4 "Snow Bear Left Gauntlet" 5 "Snow Bear Greaves" 6 "Snow Bear Boots" 7 "Snow Bear Helm" 8 "Nothing Right Now" 9

19687285231110129998.NAME: It's simple.  You bring me the snow bear pelts and gold, and I'll make a piece of custom light snow bear armor.  I even have a special method of treating the fur that will enhance the natural protective properties against frost.  Whatever you order will be ready in twenty-four hours.  Take this scroll.  It lists my prices and requirements for each piece of armor.  If you're interested, and you have enough pelts and gold, talk to me again.  I'll fire up my forge, and you'll have your new armor in a day.
